channel.title: GitHub C++ Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of C++ in GitHub

item.description: Nintendo Switch Emulator

item.description: Optimized firmware for RepRap 3D printers based on the Arduino platform.

item.description: OpenPose: Real-time multi-person keypoint detection library for body, face, hands, and foot estimation

item.description: C++那些事

item.title: Trojan-Qt5/Trojan-Qt5
item.description: A cross-platform trojan GUI client based on Shadowsocks-qt. 有问题请加tg群反馈

item.title: telegramdesktop/tdesktop
item.description: Telegram Desktop messaging app

item.title: godotengine/godot
item.description: Godot Engine – Multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine

item.title: microsoft/PowerToys
item.description: Windows system utilities to maximize productivity

item.title: ouyanghuiyu/chineseocr_lite
item.description: 超轻量级中文ocr，支持竖排文字识别, 支持ncnn推理 , psenet(8.5M) + crnn(6.3M) + anglenet(1.5M) 总模型仅17M

item.title: OpenTTD/OpenTTD
item.description: OpenTTD is an open source simulation game based upon Transport Tycoon Deluxe

item.description: A library that provides an embeddable, persistent key-value store for fast storage.

item.title: ossrs/srs
item.description: SRS is a RTMP/HLS/WebRTC/SRT/GB28181 streaming cluster, high efficiency, stable and simple.

item.description: open source driving agent

item.description: The Swift Programming Language

item.description: Code repository of all OpenGL tutorials found at https://learnopengl.com

item.description: A modern formatting library

item.description: Portable and lightweight cross platform application development framework

item.title: bkaradzic/bgfx
item.description: Cross-platform, graphics API agnostic, "Bring Your Own Engine/Framework" style rendering library.

item.title: johnboiles/obs-mac-virtualcam
item.description: Creates a virtual webcam device from the output of OBS. Especially useful for streaming smooth, composited video into Zoom, Hangouts, Jitsi etc. Like obs-virtualcam but for macOS.
